email.subject: RE: What it's going on?
email.body:
WWhat the.
Did you see that? That server is just... I don't know, sorry you had to be part of this, don't worry! maybe it's some stupid server to scare children or script kiddies. I may go take a nap, I'm so tired, see you in however many days I sleep for!
We'll be in touch, maybe.
